Package com.foreach.across.modules.entity.registry.properties

Class DefaultEntityPropertyRegistryProvider

java.lang.Object
com.foreach.across.modules.entity.registry.properties.DefaultEntityPropertyRegistryProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
EntityPropertyRegistryProvider
@Service public class DefaultEntityPropertyRegistryProvider extends Object implements EntityPropertyRegistryProvider
Manages the EntityPropertyRegistry instances for a set of entity types. Dispatches to DefaultEntityPropertyRegistryProvider.PropertiesRegistrar instances for attribute generation. The collection of DefaultEntityPropertyRegistryProvider.PropertiesRegistrar is a module ordered collection of beans picked up from the different modules.
Since:
2.0.0
Author:
Arne Vandamme

      public static DefaultEntityPropertyRegistryProvider newInstance()

      a new registry provider instance

      public MutableEntityPropertyRegistry get(Class<?> entityType)
      Description copied from interface: EntityPropertyRegistryProvider
      Retrieve the property registry for the given entity type. Usually the registry will be created upon the first call. Calls to this method should always return the same instance.

    • createForParentRegistry

      public MutableEntityPropertyRegistry createForParentRegistry(EntityPropertyRegistry entityPropertyRegistry)
      Description copied from interface: EntityPropertyRegistryProvider
      Creates a new registry that uses the existing as parent. Will usually return a MergingEntityPropertyRegistry where the property descriptors are also inherited.
      Specified by:
      createForParentRegistry in interface EntityPropertyRegistryProvider
      Parameters:
      entityPropertyRegistry - that is the parent
      Returns:
